segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman drying a plate at the sink, looking so focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh no, the sink is overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the edge right onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in the puddle but doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, there's a boy on a stool reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl is standing nearby, holding out her hand for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky while the mom is busy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one hears the water splashing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a big mess if something doesn't change.
segments.speaker: PAR
